name: Devil's Advocate
firstNightReminder: The Devil's Advocate chooses a living player.
otherNightReminder: The Devil's Advocate chooses a living player.
ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
flavor: "My client, should the objection be overruled, pleads innocent by virtue of the prosecution's non-observance of statute 27.B - incorrect or misleading conjugation of a verb. The fact that nine of the jury died last night is simplyprima facie,which is, as Wills vs Thule set precedent for, further reason to acquit."
